name: Free Online PDF Page Rotator - ATools
description: Free online PDF page rotator. Rotate all pages or selected pages (90/180/270) locally in your browser.
seoDescription: Free online PDF page rotator that rotates all pages or selected page ranges by 90/180/270 degrees. Choose to rotate relative to the current angle or set a fixed rotation. Everything runs locally in your browser with zero uploads for privacy.

ui.hint: Rotate PDF pages locally in your browser (no uploads).
ui.note: Tip: large PDFs may take longer and use more memory.
